TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You and the wall are now one.

I wish an autonomous missle-like weapon with warp capabilities, and for you not to give the obvious corruption to this one.

granted, however, a targeting error made the weapon target your continent. the warhead is big enough to destroy the continent, so you die

i wish for a nuke heading for me

Granted. Due to navigation error, it misses and destroys the rest of the continent.

I wish my secret wish.

Edited March 3, 2015 by InterCity
Failed to add a wish

Nothing to grant...

I wish he had posted a wish I could grant...

Granted, however it is incredibly vulgar.

I wish to be a cyborg like Raiden

Granted. You will be assimilated

I wish for a perfect circle.

You can't draw anything else but perfect circles now.

I wish to send Jeb on a one way trip to Eeloo.

Granted. His wife sues you for it and wins 240 000 000 000 KerBucks in the process. KSC has to shut down operations. FOREVER!

I wish to be an invincible god of a vast alien population.

granted. your the god of a alien race,of cows.

i wish to have a pocket of the universe.

Granted. The complex nature of 4-dimensional spacetime causes your pocket to contain headcrabs. Lots of headcrabs.

I wish for chips made out of wheat.

Granted all computers are now useless

I wish for to be rich as bill gates

Granted. Hyperinflation.

I wish for a pack of Pringles.

Granted, they're stale.

I wish my head was as big as a Kerbal's.

Granted. However, your brain remains the sames size, and it squeezes out your nose.

I wish for a Pug.

Granted. It has a neurosis and pees whenever you try to pick it up.

I wish I had fried ice cream.

Granted. You get fried with an ice cream. You have a fried ice cream but you are fried as well.

I wish for something terrible to happen.

Granted, you go about your day paranoid about the terrible event you know is going to happen. When you lie in bed you remain paranoid because the terrible thing still hasn't happened. Over time you begin to lose friends, your job, and all connections outside of your house. The terrible event did happen. You became paranoid.

I wish I was psychologically stable.

Granted. Your mind will never change its state, preventing you from thinking and ultimately even breathing, because your mind only commands to inhale, not to exhale.

I wish that Civilization V went on 90% sale on steam this weekend.

Granted, but BNW is now a negative 90% sale!

I wish for Another Brick in the Wall to not be stuck in my head.

Granted. Instead, a physical brick strikes your head.

I wish Roger Waters had stuck with Pink Floyd.

Granted. They all end up dying in a plane crash six months after he decides not to quit the band because he caused them to miss their scheduled flight.

I wish I knew an exploitable loophole that would allow uncorrupted wishes.

Granted, however said loophole makes your wishes have different meaning.

I wish fr some sauce

Granted. The sauce is the source for some disgusting post on Reddit and you die from shock.

I wish I knew Russian.

Granted, but M.A.D. ends up causing the destruction of the Russian people (and the world) so the language is useless.

I wish for a cup of milk.

Granted but it's sour

i hitler was never born
